name: In A World Of My Own (Experience Test)
name_original: In A World Of My Own (Experience Test)
description:
What does it feel like to fight depression?

This short demo attempts to answer this question through the use of gameplay and narrative. Gameplay is centered around a (slightly) detailed combo system of heavy and light attacks. Coupled with AI, it isn't as easy as button mashing to fight. The narrative puts the player inside a foggy forest ridden with enmity and thought. The player only has their attacks to fend off thought, as well as memories which can heal the player.

It's mostly bare bones, but it helps push a player experience forward. 3D models are off the asset store.

Gamepad extremely recommended.

Controls:

A-Jump B-Interact X-Light Y-Heavy

LB-Special RB-Memory RT-Dash
